Class CcddDataTypeHandler

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

        protected static java.lang.String getDataTypeName(java.lang.String[] dataType)

        Returns:
        User-defined data type name; if blank then the C-language name

      • getDataTypeReferences

        protected java.lang.String[] getDataTypeReferences(java.lang.String dataTypeName,
                                       java.awt.Component parent)
        Get a list containing the tables in the project database that reference the specified data type name. Only search for references in the prototype tables (any references in the custom values table are automatically updated when the prototype is changed)
        Parameters:
        dataTypeName - data type name for which to search
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
        Returns:
        List containing the tables in the database that reference the specified data type name

      • updateDataTypes

        protected void updateDataTypes(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> dataTypeDefinitions)
                        throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Add new data types and check for matches with existing ones
        Parameters:
        dataTypeDefinitions - list of data type definitions
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an data type with the same same already exists and the imported type doesn't match

      • highlightSizeof

        protected static void highlightSizeof(java.awt.Component component,
                   java.lang.String text,
                   java.awt.Color hightlightColor)
        Highlight any sizeof() calls in the the specified text component
        Parameters:
        component - reference to the table cell renderer component
        text - cell value
        hightlightColor - color used for highlighting the sizeof() call

      • insertDataTypeName

        protected void insertDataTypeName(java.awt.Window owner,
                      javax.swing.JTextArea textArea,
                      boolean includePrimitives,
                      java.lang.String[] structures)
        Display a pop-up combo box containing the names of the defined data types: primitive data types (dependent on the input flag) and structures. When the user selects a data type insert it into the supplied text field
        Parameters:
        owner - dialog owning the pop-up combo box
        textArea - text field over which to display the pop-up combo box and insert the selected data type name
        includePrimitives - true to include primitive data types in the list; false to include only structures
        structures - Array containing the data types to display in the pop-up; null to build the array

      • positionStructurePopup

        private void positionStructurePopup(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
        Position the dialog containing the structure pop-up combo box at the text cursor position in the text field
        Parameters:
        textArea - text field over which to display the pop-up combo box

      • getInsertedStructure

        private java.lang.String getInsertedStructure(java.lang.String text,
                                    javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
        Get the text of the specified text field with the structure name or value inserted at the current selection point
        Parameters:
        text - structure name or value
        textArea - text field over which the pop-up combo box is displayed
        Returns:
        Text of the specified text field with the structure name or value inserted at the current selection point
